CustomField.description: Used for SREC CS Product sizing. It's the sum of the Future Annual Cost of Electricity (rollup) field on all related Utility Account Subscriptions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for SREC CS Product sizing. It's the sum of the Future Annual Cost of Electricity (rollup) field on all related Utility Account Subscriptions.
CustomField.label: Subscribed Annual Cost of Electricity
